VALIDATE_EMAIL_SUB_HEADER: In order to increase the security of the system, we need to verify your identity. Currently, your account has not been verified, please check your Email and verify your account to continue using the services ours.

HOME_PAGE_SLOGAN: ITCommunity is a community of IT professionals and enthusiasts. We are a place to share and grow the knowledge of IT!

NEWEST_SERIES_DESCRIPTION: Series with zero posts will only be displayed on users profile page, and will not be listed here.
